DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , single-arm , multiple ascend dose Phase I study assess dose- concentration-dependent displacement [ 18F ] MNI-659 [ PET tracer target phosphodiesterase 10 ( PDE10 ) ] EVP-6308 .
DOC.brief_title: Study EVP-6308 Assess Dose- Concentration-dependent Displacement 18FMNI-659 EVP-6308
